page.title: 14Recreation.
page.content: {Leisure activities.}Of the people we asked the most popular activity was gardening with over 30%. Other popular activities are:- reading 25%, outdoor sports 24%. However only 15% of the people were prepared to travel to take part in leisure activities. Several people play{musical {instruments,}mainly piano, then guitar and recorder. Other instruments include: oboe, trumpet, trombone, violin, cello and organ. 26% of the people own a{home computer. {Pets}are popular, cats being the most popular, followed by dogs and then fish. {Holidays.}Asked for their preference between holidays in Britain or abroad, 60% said they would stay in Britain, 50% would prefer to be by the sea, and 50% usually holiday with friends or relatives.
